DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator relating to information regarding a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment being brought back and admitted to an institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information regarding a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment being brought back and admitted to an institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.:Make or do or perform again.:The condition of being allowed to enter.

Concepts.definition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.
Make or do or perform again.
The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: released as part of draft content review;SD 12/21/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was the patient re-admitted f
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient re-admitted for any reason within 30 days of surgery?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was there a readmission within 30 days?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient readmitted within 90 days after the initial operation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was there evidence of unplanned clinic visits?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Re-admission for reconstruction related issue(s) including but not limited to infection, wound healing complication or pain

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was there evidence of unplanned admission, clinic visits, or emergency room visits due to CINV?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient readmitted to the hospital during this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was patient discharged after beginning chemotherapy and then readmitted during Induction?
